notes.text:
This update for libsamplerate fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2017-7697: Fixed a buffer overflow in calc_output_single.  (bsc#1033564)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: In libsamplerate before 0.1.9, a buffer over-read occurs in the calc_output_single function in src_sinc.c via a crafted audio file.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
